-- Switch to the right database
USE woca_ldw
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'woca_data_src')

    -- Create External Data Source

        LOCATION = 'abfss://woca-senegia-data@asawocadevstaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net'
    )
    GO


---DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE woca_data_src
